channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: WTA综述：中国组合晋级ATX公开赛四分之一决赛
item.description: No. 8 seed Yue Yuan of China and countrywoman Yafan Wang both completed sweeps on Wednesday in the second round of the ATX Open in Austin, Texas.翻译:周三，在德克萨斯州奥斯汀举行的 ATX 公开赛第二轮比赛中，中国八号种子袁悦和同胞王亚凡双双横扫对手。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美元为美国通胀数据做好准备，日元因日本央行言论而上涨
item.description: The U.S. dollar held firm on Thursday in the lead up to U.S. inflation data that could ruffle the interest rate outlook, while the yen found its footing after comments from Bank of Japan official hinted at the need to exit ultra-easy policies.翻译:美元周四保持坚挺，美国通胀数据可能会影响利率前景，而日元则在日本央行官员暗示需要退出超宽松政策后站稳脚跟。
item.author: Tom Westbrook

item.title: 在微妙的中国戏中，利洁时转向直播销售安全套
item.description: Durex-owner Reckitt is hoping that Chinese consumers' penchant for livestream shopping will also extend to purchases of condoms, but the company will have to toe a "delicate line" as it looks to grow its slice of the $5-billion-plus condom market.翻译:杜蕾斯母公司利洁时希望中国消费者对直播购物的喜爱也能延伸到安全套的购买上，但该公司在寻求扩大其在价值超过 50 亿美元的安全套市场中的份额时，将不得不采取“微妙的路线”。 。
item.author: Richa Naidu, Casey Hall

item.title: 呼吁澳大利亚间谍头子公布“出卖”的前政治家的名字
item.description: Australia’s spy chief faced calls on Thursday to name the former politician he said had “sold out” to a foreign intelligence service, with Canberra’s former ambassador to the United States saying it could “potentially smear everyone” unless the person was identified.翻译:澳大利亚间谍局长周四面临要求点名这位前政治家的指控，他称这位前政客“出卖”给了外国情报机构，堪培拉前驻美国大使表示，除非查明此人的身份，否则这可能“可能抹黑所有人”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着中国兴趣减弱，亚洲对冲基金发行数量降至 14 年来的最低水平
item.description: Only 62 new hedge funds launched in Asia last year, the lowest since number since 2009 and just 15 were China-focused funds, data provider Preqin said.翻译:数据提供商 Preqin 表示，去年亚洲仅推出 62 只新对冲基金，这是自 2009 年以来数量最低的，而且只有 15 只专注于中国的基金。
item.author: Summer Zhen

item.title: 亚洲股市在美国通胀数据公布前大幅下挫；日元上涨
item.description: Asian equities were mostly weaker on Thursday, while the dollar and U.S. Treasuries were largely steady ahead of crucial U.S. inflation data that could provide fresh clues on when the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates.翻译:周四亚洲股市大多走软，而在重要的美国通胀数据公布之前，美元和美国国债基本保持稳定，这些数据可能为美联储何时降息提供新线索。
item.author: Kevin Buckland

item.title: 南华早报报道，澳大利亚邀请中国王毅下个月访华
item.description: Australia has invited Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi to visit in the later part of March for discussions spanning trade, security and more, the South China Morning Post reported on Thursday citing sources.翻译:《南华早报》周四援引消息人士的话称，澳大利亚已邀请中国外交部长王毅于 3 月下旬访问，就贸易、安全等领域进行讨论。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 财政部长称中国向巴基斯坦提供超过20亿美元贷款
item.description: China has rolled over a $2 billion loan to Pakistan, caretaker finance minister Shamshad Akhtar confirmed in a response to Reuters on Thursday.翻译:看守财政部长沙姆沙德·阿赫塔尔周四在回应路透社时证实，中国已向巴基斯坦提供了 20 亿美元贷款。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 朝鲜金正恩在不平等加剧的情况下寻求农村地区的“产业革命”
item.description: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un has called for an "industry revolution" in rural regions by building factories nationwide, state media KCNA said on Thursday, amid chronic food shortages and widening economic inequality.翻译:官方媒体朝中社周四表示，在长期粮食短缺和经济不平等加剧的情况下，朝鲜领导人金正恩呼吁在全国范围内建设工厂，在农村地区进行“工业革命”。
item.author: Hyonhee Shin

item.title: 大众汽车和小鹏汽车称首款合资汽车将是电动SUV
item.description: German automaker Volkswagen and Chinese electric vehicle (EV) partner XPeng on Thursday said the first car they plan to develop together will be an SUV for which they will jointly source parts.翻译:德国汽车制造商大众汽车和中国电动汽车 (EV) 合作伙伴小鹏汽车周四表示，他们计划合作开发的第一款汽车将是一款 SUV，并将为其联合采购零部件。
item.author: Sarah Wu, Echha Jain

item.title: 商务部长表示中方愿加强与埃及的经贸合作
item.description: China is willing to further promote economic and trade cooperation with Egypt, and to continue to encourage and support its enterprises to invest and start businesses in the African country, the Chinese commerce ministry cited its minister as saying.翻译:中国商务部援引中国商务部部长的话说，中方愿进一步促进与埃及的经贸合作，继续鼓励和支持中国企业赴埃投资兴业。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 论文称加拿大因与北京分享信息而解雇了两名科学家
item.description: Canada fired two scientists working at a high-security infectious disease laboratory in 2021 because they provided confidential information to China, the Globe and Mail newspaper reported on Wednesday.翻译:据《环球邮报》周三报道，加拿大于 2021 年解雇了两名在高度安全的传染病实验室工作的科学家，因为他们向中国提供了机密信息。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早间竞价：聚光灯聚焦日本、澳大利亚消费者
item.description: A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 北京将举办2027年世锦赛
item.description: Beijing has been selected to host the 2027 World Athletics Championships, governing body World Athletics said on Wednesday.翻译:世界田径管理机构周三表示，北京已被选为举办 2027 年世界田径锦标赛。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国汽车制造商比亚迪高管表示正在寻找墨西哥工厂选址
item.description: Chinese electric vehicle maker BYD is looking for a location in Mexico to set up a factory aimed at boosting the company's share of the local market, BYD Americas CEO Stella Li told Reuters on Wednesday.翻译:比亚迪美洲公司首席执行官斯特拉·李周三对路透社表示，中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪正在墨西哥寻找建厂地点，旨在提高该公司在当地市场的份额。
item.author: Daina Beth Solomon

item.title: 美国贸易负责人本周排除了世贸组织争端解决方案，但表示情绪积极
item.description: U.S. Trade Representative Katherine Tai on Wednesday ruled out an agreement on World Trade Organization dispute settlement appeals reform this week but said WTO negotiations on the issue were positive and showing some progress.翻译:美国贸易代表凯瑟琳·戴周三排除了本周就世贸组织争端解决上诉改革达成协议的可能性，但表示世贸组织就此问题的谈判是积极的，并显示出一些进展。
item.author: Alexander Cornwell

item.title: 西方大国在G20金融会议上就俄罗斯资产展开争论
item.description: Western powers butted heads over how to handle frozen Russian assets on Wednesday as G20 finance ministers kicked off a discussion of challenges for the global economy, trying to set aside deep geopolitical divisions.翻译:周三，二十国集团财长开始讨论全球经济面临的挑战，试图搁置深刻的地缘政治分歧，西方大国就如何处理被冻结的俄罗斯资产发生了争执。
item.author: Andrea Shalal, Christian Kraemer, Marcela Ayres

item.title: Polestar 融资近 10 亿美元，预计 2024 年利润率将有所改善
item.description: Polestar said on Wednesday it had raised a $950 million loan from a bank syndicate, helping to fill a gap left when Volvo Cars said it would stop funding the electric carmaker, sending its New York-listed shares 18.5% higher.翻译:Polestar周三表示，已从银行财团筹集了9.5亿美元贷款，有助于填补沃尔沃汽车表示将停止向这家电动汽车制造商提供资金后留下的资金缺口，导致其在纽约上市的股价上涨18.5%。
item.author: Marie Mannes

item.title: ATP与沙特阿拉伯PIF签署多年战略合作伙伴关系
item.description: The ATP Tour and Saudi Arabia's Public Investment Fund (PIF) have signed a multi-year strategic partnership, the governing body of men's tennis said on Wednesday in a move highlighting the growing influence of the Gulf nation on global sport.翻译:男子网球管理机构周三表示，ATP巡回赛和沙特阿拉伯公共投资基金（PIF）已经签署了一项多年战略合作伙伴关系，此举凸显了这个海湾国家对全球体育运动日益增长的影响力。
item.author: Shrivathsa Sridhar

item.title: 中国承诺对贫困的塞拉利昂进行投资
item.description: Chinese President Xi Jinping promised to encourage Chinese firms to invest in minerals-rich but economically ailing Sierra Leone as part of Beijing's long-term drive to deepen economic and political ties with Africa.翻译:中国国家主席习近平承诺鼓励中国企业投资矿产丰富但经济陷入困境的塞拉利昂，作为北京深化与非洲经济和政治关系长期努力的一部分。
item.author: Reuters
